title: Celebrate Or Criticize?
description:
Pablo Torre, Domonique Foxworth and Mike Golic Jr. debate if they would rather start today by celebrating the Bengals or crushing the Chiefs for blowing an 18-point lead before giving their thoughts on the ongoing Tom Brady retirement saga.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: (debatable): Was The AFC Title More About The Bengals Win Or Chiefs Losing?
